availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Leonard Bhymer (Kenton County, Kentucky, farm laborer.)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Ellen Lemmon Bhymer. Father of Louisa B'Hymer. Farm laborer in Kenton County in 1860. Deputy sheriff in Kenton County in 1864.

ab.bibl: Find A Grave, "Leonard B'Hymer (1837-1878)," Memorial #36491698, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=36491698&ref=acom (accessed March 23, 2017); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Kenton County, District 1, p. 143; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Butler, p. 3.
